name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor
display_help: Radiation emanates from your body which harms foes, but empowers and shields yourself. You can use this energy to absorb damage, heal from your wounds and debilitate nearby foes.

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Alpha_Barrier
powers.display_help: You cloak yourself in a field of protective radiation that grants you a good deal of resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Toxic damage. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 21.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
24.50% resistance to toxic damage for 0.75s on self
21.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
24.50% resistance to toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Gamma_Boost
powers.display_help: Gamma Boost grants you a passive boost to both regeneration and recovery. The lower your current health is, the greater the regeneration bonus you'll receive from Gamma Boost. The higher your current health is, the greater the recovery bonus you'll receive from Gamma Boost. This power is always active.

display_info: 13.84% resistance to regeneration rate debuff for 1.25s on self
55.36% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 1.25s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Proton_Armor
powers.display_help: When active, your body is encased in a shield-like radiation barrier that gives you good resistance to Energy and Fire damage and moderate resistance to Cold and Negative Energy attacks. Recharge: Very Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self, +Res(Energy, Fire, Cold and Negative)

display_info: 28.00% resistance to energy damage for 0.75s on self
21.00% resistance to fire damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
5.25% resistance to cold damage for 0.75s on self
28.00% resistance to energy damage for 0.75s on self
21.00% resistance to fire damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
5.25% resistance to cold damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Fallout_Shelter
powers.display_help: While active you are protected from recharge, movement, hold, sleep, immobilize, stun and knockdown effects. Additionally Fallout Shelter grants you minor resistance to toxic and psionic damage as well as a measure of resistance against slow effects. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Stun, Knockdown, Toxic, Psi, Slow)

display_info: -8.3 hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 0.75s on self
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 0.75s on self
-10.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 0.75s on self
3.50% resistance to fire damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
10.50% resistance to psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
29.06% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff, recharge debuff for 0.75s on self
83.04% resistance to hold, stun, sleep for 0.75s on self
83.04% resistance to immobilize for 0.75s on self
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 0.75s on self
-10.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to to hit debuff for 0.75s on self
3.50% resistance to fire damage, energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
10.50% resistance to psionic damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Proton_Therapy
powers.display_help: You concentrate your energies to harness the healing powers of radiation to mend your wounds. The effects of Proton Therapy also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage and regeneration debuffs for a while, in addition to giving you some endurance over time. Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Self Heal, Endurance over time, Res(Toxic, -Regen)

display_info: 14.00% resistance to toxic damage for 1m 0s on self
3 ticks of 5.00 endurance over 2.1s on self
20.76% resistance to regeneration rate debuff for 1m 0s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Particle_Acceleration
powers.display_help: Your Particles have been accelerated allowing you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

display_info: 20.00% strength to recharge for 10.25s on self
40.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, recharge debuff for 10.25s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Particle_Shielding
powers.display_help: You channel a tremendous amount of radiation into a barrier around you. For a short time you will have a strong absorption shield in addition to a regeneration and recovery buff. Recharge: Long

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Ground_Zero
powers.display_help: You release a mixture of radiation into the area. Nearby foes will be barraged with harmful radiation and will suffer Moderate Energy damage immediately, followed by moderate toxic damage over time. Affected foes will also have their defense reduced. Nearby allies will be healed for a moderate amount and will recover health over time. This power can affect a total of 30 targets. This includes both friends and foes. Ground Zero has no effect on the caster, only nearby allies and enemies. Damage: Moderate, Moderate DoT, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Foe Moderate DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT(Toxic), -DEF(All), Ally +HP, +Heal over time

display_info: 10 ticks of 5.28 toxic damage over 9.1s on target after 1s delay
-14.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
10 ticks of 6.02 heal over 9.1s on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Sentinel_Defense.Radiation_Armor.Meltdown
powers.display_help: After building up a dangerous amount of radiation you release it to both shield and empower yourself. While active you will gain a good amount of damage resistance to all types of damage, recover endurance more quickly and deal more damage for a short time. When this power wears off you will lose a small amount endurance. Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 14.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 0s on self
33.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 1m 0s on self
-10000.00% recovery rate for 10s on self after 1m 0s delay
100.00% resistance to recovery rate debuff for 10s on self after 1m 0s delay
